thread.title: Live images of Samsung Galaxy S8 leak
thread.title_full: Live images of Samsung Galaxy S8 leak

title: Live images of Samsung Galaxy S8 leak
text:
Samsung Android 
Samsung Galaxy S8 has one month in rumorland before we see the real device on March 29. Until then we can rely solely on leaks like this one. A Chinese case manufacturer leaked live photos of the next Samsung flagship. 
From the images we see the device will have dual-curved display. On the top of the front panel there are plenty of sensors and cameras and we even see an iris-scanner. On the bottom we see 3.5mm jack, USB-C and a speaker, possibly by Harman. 
The most interesting part is the powered display with the contextual Grace UX menu. Looks like Galaxy S8 will not have the fully bezel-less experience Xiaomi Mi Mix gives but still the display-size ratio is impressive. 
Samsung Galaxy S8 will come in two options, 5.7/5.8 and a S8+ version with 6.2 screen. It will be powered by Snapdragon 835 and will have a fingerprint scanner on the back and a Bixby AI dedicated button.
